__e: Dream and hope, death and despair. Can one find a reason for living in the act of believing and accepting all of this?
The stress of waiting, of not knowing if or... when we could put an end to this.
And I don't want to have to live up to anyone's expectations.
Right now, I'm sitting around here. I'm waiting for a bullet.
There's no law against waiting for someone.
I'm guessing you're longing for either a renewed relationship with your dad... or a new relationship with one of the Village People.
Now, I want you to go tell the others the wait is over.
The waiting is the worst part.
You know, she also said the waiting list is like eight months.
